title: World Customize Creator - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Artifact Crafting   Cheats   Dense Protagonist   Discrimination   Game Elements   Male Protagonist   Military   Monsters   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Romantic Subplot   Royalty   Shy Characters   Special Abilities   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   Wars

description: Tagami Yusuke, led by a mysterious voice, is summoned to another world, 'Caltsio'. He was just a young video-game lover, but Fate decided to make him become the 'Evil God of Calamity' of this world, obtaining the ability to create and customize everything, Customize Creation.>
